CHAT.comment: JOHNNY PAUL PENRY, Petitioner v. GARY L. JOHNSON, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, INSTITUTIONAL DIVISION.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT S. SMITH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANDY TAYLOR ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GENE C. SCHAERR ON BEHALF OF ALABAMA, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT S. SMITH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:59 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
